person.persName: Samuel M. Bernard (Hopkinsville attorney, asylum manager, and notary public)

body.p: Hopkinsville, Kentucky, lawyer, asylum manager, and notary public. Kentucky native. Attorney in Hopkinsville in 1850 and 1860. Manager of the Western Lunatic Asylum of Kentucky in 1861. Notary public in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1864.
